intellimate.izou.system

Class FileInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • intellimate.izou.system.FileInfo

  • public class FileInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Information for files registered in the FileManager, it is what is processed when a file-event has been raised in the file manager

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileInfo(java.nio.file.Path path, java.lang.String fileType, AddOn addOn)
      creates a new FileInfo object
      FileInfo(java.nio.file.Path path, java.lang.String fileType, AddOn addOn, ReloadableFile reloadableFile)
      creates a new FileInfo object
      FileInfo(java.nio.file.Path path, java.lang.String fileType, ReloadableFile reloadableFile)
      creates a new FileInfo object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AddOn getAddOn()
      gets the addOn to which the registered file belongs
      java.lang.String getFileType()
      gets file type or name of file
      java.lang.String getID()
      Gets id of file-info
      java.nio.file.Path getPath()
      gets directory path of fileInfo
      ReloadableFile getReloadableFile()
      gets the reloadable files to which the registered file belongs

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileInfo

        public FileInfo(java.nio.file.Path path,
                java.lang.String fileType,
                AddOn addOn)
        creates a new FileInfo object
        Parameters:
        path - path of DIRECTORY (not file itself!!!!) where file to be watched is located
        fileType - the type of file the file is, can be name or extension or both (Ex: "test", "txt", "test.txt" all work)
        addOn - the addOn that requires the file

      • FileInfo

        public FileInfo(java.nio.file.Path path,
                java.lang.String fileType,
                ReloadableFile reloadableFile)
        creates a new FileInfo object
        Parameters:
        path - path of DIRECTORY (not file itself!!!!) where file to be watched is located
        fileType - the type of file the file is, can be name or extension or both (Ex: "test", "txt", "test.txt" all work)
        reloadableFile - interface that includes update method

      • FileInfo

        public FileInfo(java.nio.file.Path path,
                java.lang.String fileType,
                AddOn addOn,
                ReloadableFile reloadableFile)
        creates a new FileInfo object
        Parameters:
        path - path of DIRECTORY (not file itself!!!!) where file to be watched is located
        fileType - the type of file the file is, can be name or extension or both (Ex: "test", "txt", "test.txt" all work)
        addOn - the addOn that requires the file
        reloadableFile - interface that includes update method
